"Hero's Adventure" Age warning
1. This game is an open-world martial arts game with a pixelated ancient theme, suitable for users aged 12 and above. It is recommended that minors use the game under the supervision of a guardian.
2. The game has main and side storylines, which are advanced through dialogue, interaction, and combat. By simulating a real martial arts world, each user can realize their martial arts dream, enjoy enmity, and wander the world with a sword, making the game world more open and exploratory.
3. The game has a real-name authentication system. Users who are authenticated as minors will be subject to the following game restrictions:
Minors cannot use the game from 22:00 to 8:00 the next day, and cannot use it for more than 3 hours on statutory holidays, and cannot use it for more than 1.5 hours at other times.
4. The game unfolds the plot based on a fictional world, adopts distinctive art design, unique pixel graphics, and high-quality game music. While experiencing the game, you should comply with relevant laws and regulations.
context:
《大侠立志传》适龄提示
1、本游戏是一款像素古风题材的开放武侠游戏，适用于年满12周岁及以上的用户，建议未成年人在监护人的监护下使用游戏产品。
2、本游戏设置了主线、支线剧情，通过对话、交互及战斗推动剧情，通过模拟真实的江湖生态让每一位用户实现自己心中的武侠梦，在游戏中可以快意恩仇，持剑天涯，让游戏世界更加具有开放性和探索性。
3、本游戏中有用户实名认证系统，认证为未成年的用户将受到以下游戏限制：
未成年人用户每日22时至次日8时不得使用游戏，法定节假日每天不得使用超过3小时，其他时间每天不得使用超过1.5小时。
4、游戏基于架空世界展开剧情，采用风格鲜明的美术设计、风格特异的像素画面以及优质的游戏配乐，在体验游戏的同时应遵循相关法律法规。

<size=24><space=2em>Hello, everyone! We have just released a new version, introducing a fresh protagonist illustration and the "Goddess Temple Event." Additionally, we've addressed several issues impacting your gameplay experience. 

<size=24><space=2em>Should you encounter any issues during your gameplay, feel free to reach out to us in our [official Discord](https://discord.gg/bcX8pry8ZV)  for support and provide your insights. Be assured, we're committed to swiftly addressing your concerns. A heartfelt thank you for your patience.

<space=2em>V1.0.1201b54 Version Log:

<space=2em>New Feature:
<space=2em>1. The protagonist now has a new illustration, which can be selected in the character creation menu.
<space=2em>2. Several sects have added new daily sect events, added new ways to acquire sect contributions.
<space=2em>3. Added the "Goddess Temple Event," can be triggered in the abandoned garden in the southwest region.

<space=2em>Adjustments:
<space=2em>1. Four times speed is now available in battles, and you can toggle it during combat.
<space=2em>2. Increased rewards for the "Nine Factions Sect" event to include Heaven Spirits Card.
<space=2em>3. Subjugating or exterminating Jiujiang Water Camp now grants Heaven Spirits Card.
<space=2em>4. Learning skills from Ling Hongxuan, Jiang Nanguai, and the Down-and-out wanderer in the Nameless Area now grants machinery ability experience.
<space=2em>5. The merchant in Swallow's Nest will sell keys for opening treasure chests.
<space=2em>6. Upon reaching Reputation Level 3, the clothing store owner in the city will gift the schematic for crafting Jianghu outfit.
<space=2em>7. Adjusted the recruitment conditions for Yu Weier and Gu Qingcheng: If Fu Yaoqin is in the party, you can also invite Yu Weier and Gu Qingcheng to join.
<space=2em>8. Adjusted the conditions for Yu Weier to acquire her bonding skill: Players will have to complete the "Rescue Yu Weier" event in the Jiuli Tribe for the event to trigger.
<space=2em>9. Enhanced the daily sect contribution rewards for Langya Sword Pavilion.
<space=2em>10. Adjusted the feature "Financial Prosperity"; its money bonus is now ineffective in the dice mini-game.
<space=2em>11. Adjusted the strength of the West Pass guards.
<space=2em>12. Certain items required for events can no longer be auctioned.
<space=2em>13. Adjusted the initial status of Cai Yuanchang and added the character states of Zhuge Divine Mechanism and Ding Hai Tang.
<space=2em>14. During the final battle, sect leaders with a relationship level of 80 won't become hostile to the protagonist.
<space=2em>15. Adjusted the reward for the "Business in Jiujiang Water Camp" event to martial arts enlightenment; the original reward "Asura Blade" can now be obtained in Waterfall Pond after defeating the Fu Bu Guard in Cloud Sea Cliff.
<space=2em>16. Accelerated the progress bar animation during martial arts enlightenment.
<space=2em>17. Optimized the time compass display in the English version.

<space=2em>Fixes:
<space=2em>1.Fixed an issue where after killing Yan Wuzhu in the Yan Army route, the narration inaccurately states the successful defense of Chuxiang City.
<space=2em>2.Fixed the problem with the description display of the tips for the books "Reverse the Universe" and "Unifying the Nine Factions"
<space=2em>3.Fixed an issue where players can not steal the prison key from the Centurion outside the Yan Army camp.
<space=2em>4.Fixed the problem where pets could continue to be fed even when there was insufficient food.
<space=2em>5.Fixed the issue where Yan Gexing would disappear under specific circumstances.
<space=2em>6.Fixed the display issue of the homestead after the death of the Poison Dragon.
<space=2em>7.Fixed the problem where in extreme situations, teammates unable to join the battle caused a freeze.
<space=2em>8.Fixed the issue where battle scenes on the world map did not disappear.
<space=2em>9.Fixed the problem in controller mode where the preset battle character selection interface did not close after a world map battle.
<space=2em>10.Fixed the issue after joining the Yan Gexing faction you can go to the Confucius Temple before triggering the event at the General's Mansion.

———————————————————————————————————————————————————

<space=2em>V1.0.1124b53 Version Log

<space=2em>New Feature:
<space=2em>1. Added new achievements related to forming connections.

<space=2em>Adjustments:
<space=2em>1. Adjusted the bonding event at the God of Marriage's Shrine: At the beginning, you will initiate a battle with the target character. Victory leads you to an immediate bond, and defeat leads to the second phase.
<space=2em>2. Adjusted "Bestowed Title and Rank" to a non-true ending event, modifying the achievement description.
<space=2em>3. Resting at the stone table in the Homestead's Back Mountain now restores vitality.
<space=2em>4. Copper Man event optimization: After selecting to help Lai Toudian, you won't be stopped upon entering Arhat Hall.
<space=2em>5. Adjusted Yan Rurui's status event: It can now be completed even when Duke Kang ascends the throne or dies (will only affect saves that have not triggered this event and new playthroughs).
<space=2em>6. Modified the character progression of  "The dev" character, allowing automatic learning of martial arts after a certain time in Hard and Asura difficulties.

<space=2em>Fixes:
<space=2em>1. Fixed the issue where switching equipment was possible even when the companion relationship was not close enough.
<space=2em>2. Fixed the problem where learning the Ruler Heart Sutra did not affect internal defense stats.
<space=2em>3. Fixed the issue where the "Suspicious Person" quest did not trigger a mission tracker after level 35.
<space=2em>4. Fixed Cai Yuanchang and Fu Yaoqin's injury animations.
<space=2em>5. Resolved the problem where characters could get stuck in inaccessible areas in certain scenes in the Homestead.
<space=2em>6. Fixed the error in character creation when selecting both attributes of "Full of Stamina" and "Jianghu Conqueror."

———————————————————————————————————————————————————

<space=2em>V1.0.1122b52 Version Log

<space=2em>Fixes and Improvements:
<space=2em>1. Fixed the additional effect error of the Peerless Blade Martial Art.
<space=2em>2. Resolved the issue where certain Yan GeXing guidance quests continued to trigger after leaving the Yan GeXing sect.
<space=2em>3. Fixed the disappearance issue of Ming Bufan under specific circumstances.
<space=2em>4. Addressed the problem where, during the Duke Kang Messenger mission, entering the mission location without going through an exterior map, the game would get stuck.
<space=2em>5. Fixed the bug where triggering the "Northern Expedition" event incorrectly caused Ye Yun to disappear.
<space=2em>6. Resolved the specific situation where the extermination plot could not be triggered when going to the Nine Factions Sect.
<space=2em>7. Fixed the problem where companions might simultaneously exist in both the homestead and in the world.
<space=2em>8. Added an option for the "Loyalty to the Country" ending, allowing players to freely choose whether to join the Ye Family Battalion and change their appearance.
<space=2em>9. Removed the requirement for the Palace Camp to remain closed for Wang Yanliang to initiate the Yan Army event.
<space=2em>10. After Duke Kang appoints the protagonist as an official, canceled the hostile status of Tong Daofu; optimized the positioning of the imperial eunuch in the imperial decree.
<space=2em>11. Optimized the tracking for the Nine Factions Sect Disaster mission.
<space=2em>12. Optimizations to some of the English text.

———————————————————————————————————————————————————

<space=2em>V1.0.1120b51 Version Log
​​
<space=2em>Adjustment:
<space=2em>1. Required quantity for achievements "Big Toleration", "Never Said No", and "Drinking God" adjusted to 20.
​​
<space=2em>Fixes:
<space=2em>1. Fixed the crafting materials error for Tai Xu Robe and Immortal Robe.
<space=2em>2. Fixed the positioning error of the Tiger Guard character in old save files.
<space=2em>3. Fixed the problem where, under specific circumstances, the well investigation event in Lin'an City wouldn't trigger.
<space=2em>4. Fixed the issue of Daoxuan Sect's morning class being dismissed under certain conditions.
<space=2em>5. Fixed the incorrect travel time issue from Wuyue Ferry to Jiujiang Fotress in certain situations.
<space=2em>6. Fixed the problem where players couldn't gather clues about Chu Kuangsheng in certain circumstances in the Ice Prison.
<space=2em>7. Fixed the error of the Northern Expedition mission incorrectly triggers after players joined the Ye Family Battalion through certain endings.
<space=2em>8. Fixed the issue where the spirit beast Sichen couldn't be fed normally.
<space=2em>9. Fixed the issue where custom-difficulty saves could not be loaded.
<space=2em>10. Fixed the issue where the Dragon Sword seal conditions were met but the seals weren’t triggered.
<space=2em>11. Fixed the incorrect progress bonus description in the homestead.
<space=2em>12. Optimized the conditions for triggering Yi Zhihua's backstab event, making it possible to trigger it after completing the Enlightment Tower event or joining the Ye Family Battalion.
<space=2em>13. Optimized the achievement list sorting.
<space=2em>14. Optimized the Fengyun event in the Dali Temple: added a branching plot for players not in the Ye Family Battalion.
<space=2em>15. After Tong Daofu joins the party, the departure location will be forcefully updated to the Palace Hall position.
<space=2em>16. After the Treasure Competition ends, if Shen Wuqi is not in the party, will no longer participate in disputes between players and the Nine Factions Sect.
<space=2em>17. Optimized the Han Hongyu event: added a way for players to learn about the whereabouts of the leader of Tiger Escort.

———————————————————————————————————————————————————

<space=2em>Content Fixed in the November 18th Patch

<space=2em>New Feature:
<space=2em>1. After establishing the homestead, there is a chance to obtain additional materials required for upgrading the homestead by gathering any trees or ores. The higher the grade of the gathering point, the higher the extra drop.
<space=2em>2. After unlocking the mountain behind the homestead, placing companions on the mountain can assist the protagonist in obtaining homestead materials. The higher the companion's arm strength and the longer the actual placement time, the more materials can be obtained.
<space=2em>3. When the Yan Gexing storyline reaches the stage of returning to the Nameless Village, you can choose to leave the Yan Gexing sect. The process is the same as leaving other sects.

<space=2em>Adjustments:
<space=2em>1. Significantly reduce the enemy strength on Casual and Normal difficulty.
<space=2em>2. Modify the conditions for upgrading the homestead, removing the requirement for a specific NPC to be in the party during homestead upgrades.
<space=2em>3. Killing the prison guards in the three main city prisons will no longer decrease their faction relationship, making it easier to complete certain sect daily events.
<space=2em>4. Reduce the final event enemy NPC strength for the Crime Investigation Bureau.
<space=2em>5. Lower the number of required attempts for the Western Region Jewelry event and increase event rewards.
<space=2em>6. Change the mining event in Langya Sword Pavilion's daily events from Wang Dachui to Ouyeheng.
<space=2em>7. Add a few plot hints to the Crime Investigation Bureau event, guiding the protagonist to rest to trigger further events.
<space=2em>8. Adjust Yan Rurui's negative status to a positive one.
<space=2em>9. Modify Yan Rurui's affinity status effect, renamed to "Harmony in Marriage."
<space=2em>10. Modify Yi Zhihua's status effect "Joyful Mood."
<space=2em>11. Change the English version's time wheel in the upper right corner to pinyin display to match the in-game dialogues (temporary adjustment, we are working on a better time display for the EN version).

<space=2em>Fixes:
<space=2em>1. Fixed the issue of Wang Dachui disappearing in old saves.
<space=2em>2. Fixed the black screen issue when continuing the game after manually deleting all saves.
<space=2em>3. Fixed the inability to skip the gambling den participation.
<space=2em>4. Fixed the issue where entering the Matchmaker's Shrine after forming an affinity with Yi Zhihua would trigger a decrease in favorability events.
<space=2em>5. Fixed the text error in the daily tasks of the Nest of Swallow.
<space=2em>6. Optimized the hints and rewards for Han Hongyu's escort event.
<space=2em>7. Optimized events related to Wan Yanshaoning.
<space=2em>8. Optimized the trigger prompt for the Confucius Temple's Sage Monument.
<space=2em>9. Optimized the English version's character attribute interface: Abbreviated attributes now display full names in detailed tips.

<space=2em><#d09a09>V1.0.1201b54版本日志</color>

<space=2em>16、武道领悟时进度条动画提速

<space=2em>【修复】

<space=2em>4、修复了宠物喂养食物不足时可以继续喂养的问题

<space=2em><#d09a09>11月24日补丁已修复内容</color>

<size=24><space=2em>V1.0更新除了【家园玩法】、【九江水寨】、【名声事件】等新内容外，对大量已有事件进行了调整，部分老存档可能会与调整后的新事件存在逻辑冲突，加之200余项独立事件、新结缘NPC、彩蛋剧情等内容的引入，我们还是比较推荐大家启<#d09a09>用新档进行V1.0体验</color>。详细的Patch Note我们会放在文末供大家查阅。

<space=2em>【调整】
<space=2em>1、调整部分武功附加效果
<space=2em>2、调整部分先天资质BUFF效果
